derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from ante- + Latin diluvium 'deluge' + -an

entry.def: Antediluvian things are old or old-fashioned.

means.word_mean: 1. any of the early patriarchs who lived prior to the Deluge
2. a very old (or old fashioned) person
1. of or relating to the period before the Biblical flood;
2. so extremely old as seeming to belong to an earlier period;
